?

  • Welcome to Monitoring Here you can learn to:

    Isolate where alerts and problems are stemming from

    Conduct root cause analysis by correlating metrics with deployment activity

    Test and Monitor your app's performance over time across different locations

  • Pinpoint the Source of Alerts

    1

    This map displays where alerts are coming from. Each location shows the number of alerts, severity status, and if the location is unavailable.

    2

    Clicking on a location point in the map allows you to filter alerts to a single location.

    3

    From here, you can go to a Breakdown page for contextual details about an alert.
